name: Jewel Master: Cradle Of Rome 2
description:
The best-selling match-3 game returns to Rome in glorious 3D!

Gather materials by using your match-3 skills to build Rome from the ground up. Win the favor of the gods to unlock trophies and new abilities!

Swap adjacent tiles in order to form a row of three or more matching tiles. Form groups across the blue marble plaques to destroy them. When there are no more blue plaques, the level is complete! When matched, some tiles give you resources to build your city. New buildings will give you tiles that are more valuable and unlock new bonuses.
